name: What Is the Next
description:
You never know what you're going to control! 

It may still be that character, but it may also be an enemy, a trap, or even the map and god's eyes!

The whole world is yours to control, but it all depends on the unstable progress bar.

It's most exciting when the unstable progress bar turns red!  

In the later development, I will also add the attribute bonus playing method after reviving, which needs to consume (tea)leaves, these are, the thing falling from the enemies.

And in terms of attack methods, it will expand more, not only the current three ordinary attacks, but also the ultimate attack and special attack.

Including the game background and the improvement of art and sound effects, but these are future work.

------------------------------

Move：WASD

Attack：J

Reborn：R

------------------------------

This is completely a demo. It is full of many bugs!

Hope everything is amicable~
